00071 template <typename T>
00072 class persistent_ptr {
00073         template <typename Y>
00074         friend class persistent_ptr;
00075 
00076         typedef persistent_ptr<T> this_type;
00077 
00078 public:
00083         typedef typename nvml::detail::sp_element<T>::type element_type;
00084 
00088         persistent_ptr() : oid(OID_NULL)
00089         {
00090                 verify_type();
00091         }
00092 
00093         /*
00094          * Curly braces initialization is not used because the
00095          * PMEMoid is a plain C (POD) type and we can't add a default
00096          * constructor in there.
00097          */
00098 
00102         persistent_ptr(std::nullptr_t) noexcept : oid(OID_NULL)
00103         {
00104                 verify_type();
00105         }
00106 
00114         persistent_ptr(PMEMoid oid) noexcept : oid(oid)
00115         {
00116                 verify_type();
00117         }
00118 
00125         template <typename Y,
00126                   typename = typename std::enable_if<
00127                           std::is_convertible<Y *, T *>::value>::type>
00128         persistent_ptr(const persistent_ptr<Y> &r) noexcept : oid(r.oid)
00129         {
00130                 verify_type();
00131         }
00132 
00133         /*
00134          * Copy constructor.
00135          *
00136          * @param r Persistent pointer to the same type.
00137          */
00138         persistent_ptr(const persistent_ptr &r) noexcept : oid(r.oid)
00139         {
00140                 verify_type();
00141         }
00142 
00146         persistent_ptr(persistent_ptr &&r) noexcept : oid(std::move(r.oid))
00147         {
00148                 verify_type();
00149         }
00150 
00154         persistent_ptr &
00155         operator=(persistent_ptr &&r)
00156         {
00157                 detail::conditional_add_to_tx(this);
00158                 this->oid = std::move(r.oid);
00159 
00160                 return *this;
00161         }
00162 
00173         persistent_ptr &
00174         operator=(const persistent_ptr &r)
00175         {
00176                 detail::conditional_add_to_tx(this);
00177                 this_type(r).swap(*this);
00178 
00179                 return *this;
00180         }
00181 
00193         template <typename Y,
00194                   typename = typename std::enable_if<
00195                           std::is_convertible<Y *, T *>::value>::type>
00196         persistent_ptr &
00197         operator=(const persistent_ptr<Y> &r)
00198         {
00199                 detail::conditional_add_to_tx(this);
00200                 this_type(r).swap(*this);
00201 
00202                 return *this;
00203         }
00204 
00208         typename nvml::detail::sp_dereference<T>::type operator*() const
00209                 noexcept
00210         {
00211                 return *get();
00212         }
00213 
00217         typename nvml::detail::sp_member_access<T>::type operator->() const
00218                 noexcept
00219         {
00220                 return get();
00221         }
00222 
00228         typename nvml::detail::sp_array_access<T>::type
00229         operator[](std::ptrdiff_t i) const noexcept
00230         {
00231                 assert(i >= 0 && (i < nvml::detail::sp_extent<T>::value ||
00232                                   nvml::detail::sp_extent<T>::value == 0) &&
00233                        "persistent array index out of bounds");
00234 
00235                 return get()[i];
00236         }
00237 
00245         element_type *
00246         get() const noexcept
00247         {
00248                 return (element_type *)pmemobj_direct(this->oid);
00249         }
00250 
00254         void
00255         swap(persistent_ptr &other) noexcept
00256         {
00257                 std::swap(this->oid, other.oid);
00258         }
00259 
00260         /*
00261          * Bool conversion operator.
00262          */
00263         explicit operator bool() const noexcept
00264         {
00265                 return get() != nullptr;
00266         }
00267 
00275         const PMEMoid &
00276         raw() const noexcept
00277         {
00278                 return this->oid;
00279         }
00280 
00288         PMEMoid *
00289         raw_ptr() noexcept
00290         {
00291                 return &(this->oid);
00292         }
00293 
00297         inline persistent_ptr<T> &operator++()
00298         {
00299                 detail::conditional_add_to_tx(this);
00300                 this->oid.off += sizeof(T);
00301 
00302                 return *this;
00303         }
00304 
00308         inline persistent_ptr<T> operator++(int)
00309         {
00310                 PMEMoid noid = this->oid;
00311                 ++(*this);
00312 
00313                 return persistent_ptr<T>(noid);
00314         }
00315 
00319         inline persistent_ptr<T> &operator--()
00320         {
00321                 detail::conditional_add_to_tx(this);
00322                 this->oid.off -= sizeof(T);
00323 
00324                 return *this;
00325         }
00326 
00330         inline persistent_ptr<T> operator--(int)
00331         {
00332                 PMEMoid noid = this->oid;
00333                 --(*this);
00334 
00335                 return persistent_ptr<T>(noid);
00336         }
00337 
00341         inline persistent_ptr<T> &
00342         operator+=(std::ptrdiff_t s)
00343         {
00344                 detail::conditional_add_to_tx(this);
00345                 this->oid.off += s * sizeof(T);
00346 
00347                 return *this;
00348         }
00349 
00353         inline persistent_ptr<T> &
00354         operator-=(std::ptrdiff_t s)
00355         {
00356                 detail::conditional_add_to_tx(this);
00357                 this->oid.off -= s * sizeof(T);
00358 
00359                 return *this;
00360         }
00361 
00367         void
00368         persist(pool_base &pop)
00369         {
00370                 pop.persist(this->get(), sizeof(T));
00371         }
00372 
00379         void
00380         persist(void)
00381         {
00382                 pmemobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_oid(this->raw());
00383 
00384                 if (pop == nullptr)
00385                         throw pool_error("Cannot get pool from "
00386                                          "persistent pointer");
00387 
00388                 pmemobj_persist(pop, this->get(), sizeof(T));
00389         }
00390 
00396         void
00397         flush(pool_base &pop)
00398         {
00399                 pop.flush(this->get(), sizeof(T));
00400         }
00401 
00408         void
00409         flush(void)
00410         {
00411                 pmemobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_oid(this->raw());
00412 
00413                 if (pop == nullptr)
00414                         throw pool_error("Cannot get pool from "
00415                                          "persistent pointer");
00416 
00417                 pmemobj_flush(pop, this->get(), sizeof(T));
00418         }
00419 
00420 private:
00421         /* The underlying PMEMoid of the held object. */
00422         PMEMoid oid;
00423 
00424         /*
00425          * C++ persistent memory support has following type limitations:
00426          * en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/types/is_polymorphic
00427          * en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/types/is_default_constructible
00428          * en.cppreference.com/w/cpp/types/is_destructible
00429          */
00430         void
00431         verify_type()
00432         {
00433                 static_assert(!std::is_polymorphic<element_type>::value,
00434                               "Polymorphic types are not supported");
00435         }
00436 };

00444 template <class T>
00445 inline void
00446 swap(persistent_ptr<T> &a, persistent_ptr<T> &b) noexcept
00447 {
00448         a.swap(b);
00449 }

00456 template <typename T, typename Y>
00457 inline bool
00458 operator==(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, const persistent_ptr<Y> &rhs) noexcept
00459 {
00460         return OID_EQUALS(lhs.raw(), rhs.raw());
00461 }

00467 inline bool
00468 operator!=(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, const persistent_ptr<Y> &rhs) noexcept
00469 {
00470         return !(lhs == rhs);
00471 }

00479 {
00480         return lhs.get() == nullptr;

00520 template <typename T, typename Y>
00521 inline bool
00522 operator<(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, const persistent_ptr<Y> &rhs) noexcept
00523 {
00524         if (lhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo == rhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo)
00525                 return lhs.raw().off < rhs.raw().off;
00526         else
00527                 return lhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo < rhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo;
00528 }
00529 
00535 template <typename T, typename Y>
00536 inline bool
00537 operator<=(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, const persistent_ptr<Y> &rhs) noexcept
00538 {
00539         return !(rhs < lhs);
00540 }

00548 inline bool
00549 operator>(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, const persistent_ptr<Y> &rhs) noexcept
00550 {
00551         return (rhs < lhs);
00552 }

00561 operator>=(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, const persistent_ptr<Y> &rhs) noexcept
00562 {
00563         return !(lhs < rhs);

00571 template <typename T>
00572 inline bool
00573 operator<(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, std::nullptr_t) noexcept
00574 {
00575         return std::less<typename persistent_ptr<T>::element_type *>()(
00576                 lhs.get(), nullptr);
00577 }

00585 {
00586         return std::less<typename persistent_ptr<T>::element_type *>()(
00587                 nullptr, rhs.get());

00649 
00653 template <typename T>
00654 inline persistent_ptr<T>
00655 operator+(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, std::ptrdiff_t s)
00656 {
00657         PMEMoid noid;
00658         noid.pool_uuid_lo = lhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo;
00659         noid.off = lhs.raw().off + (s * sizeof(T));
00660         return persistent_ptr<T>(noid);
00661 }
00662 
00666 template <typename T>
00667 inline persistent_ptr<T>
00668 operator-(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, std::ptrdiff_t s)
00669 {
00670         PMEMoid noid;
00671         noid.pool_uuid_lo = lhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo;
00672         noid.off = lhs.raw().off - (s * sizeof(T));
00673         return persistent_ptr<T>(noid);
00674 }
00675 
00683 template <typename T>
00684 inline ptrdiff_t
00685 operator-(const persistent_ptr<T> &lhs, const persistent_ptr<T> &rhs)
00686 {
00687         assert(lhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo == rhs.raw().pool_uuid_lo);
00688         ptrdiff_t d = lhs.raw().off - rhs.raw().off;
00689 
00690         return d / sizeof(T);
00691 }
00692 
00696 template <typename T>
00697 std::ostream &
00698 operator<<(std::ostream &os, const persistent_ptr<T> &pptr)
00699 {
00700         PMEMoid raw_oid = pptr.raw();
00701         os << std::hex << "0x" << raw_oid.pool_uuid_lo << ", 0x" << raw_oid.off
00702            << std::dec;
00703         return os;
00704 }
